Svedo-them honkar jekh demokrati. Lavet demokrati ashar ghana-pottopa. Dolle ashar te ghana an Svedo-themm fyser asha ninna ta pottot karna Svedo-themm fyser drejas glan ta tradras glan. ¶
Dre vorsnos telal-pattjnopa ster dova te sas-saroa soralopan an Svedo-themm avar fann manuschet ta te themmeske-dives honkar manuschets glanske rakkre-mosch. Savi star basht pottar manuschet savo beddo ta rani tjakke fyser rakkra palla ta glan dova an themmeske-dives, themmeske-tingen ta helko baroske-forothem en. ¶
Politikerna an themmeske-dives pottar palla savot tjakke ashar palla helko themmen. Ministrarna dre regeringen drejar themmen ta dikkar to savot themmeske-dives kammar pottot. Politikerna dre themmeske-tingen ta baroskeforo-themmarna pottar an dolle bekk attjer themmen vorsnos boddrar dre. ¶
Akaj ler diro pennepa pre puschepa palla themmeske-dives. ¶
Themmeskebrukfara & themmeskekeribepha - Länsstyrelsen Skåne ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla te EU:s ta Sveddingens phuveskebrukfara- politik ta themmeskekeribepha politiken fussar palladabb- sor pre regionali niva. Dolle aschar te themmeskebrukfarandet saste bliddra konkuransi-soralopha ta langrojurepha sorali savrigetjiro savo dolle ekologiska phuvekerrandet bliddrar baroare ta mollepha naturi ta kulturo-themmar suttar doj dova saste ascha. Jeck jibbande themmeskekeribepha aschar ta te dolle aschar alternativo kerranden, fedig service ta sjukkar boddrande-steddopha.  ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar ninna butti friggor sav gustrar gressjokerranden. Vorsnos dikkar to ta kontrolleri gressjo steddopha sav dova kammar jeck sjukkard ta fedig steddopha. Gla te gressjoerna, ta vorsnos manischen, saste kamma kanslan attjer bhai aschar dolle jeck baro frigga te kabingen to gressjoerna produceras, kerras, te brukfaras fedigt, tradras ta brukfara fedigt. Dolle dikkas to ta kontrolleri an butti tavvar attjer Themmeskepottande- enheti ta Phuveskebrukfara- keribenpha. Gla gressjo- steddos ninna 400 ire buttare gressjo- enheti mustula dolle dokka avri jeck hortepha, jick pottoiller fann Themmeskepottande- enheti. Vorsnos dokkar avri pottoiller to vavver kettanesmengare savo mengar ninna gressjo, to exempli jycko-kere ta grejj- kere. ¶
Vorsnos dynkrar pre savrige ghav unika karrakteri ta kerrar pre kava sutt to jeck fedig progressionpha gla themmeskekeribepha. Themmeskekeribepha- programmeti aschar jick EU-program savo dokkar kerrande manisch ta vavver kerrande manisch pre themmeskekeribepha dolle hortan te rodepha lover gla te kerra, aggra, baropha roddrelser, abbo tasa baroa kompetensi ninna roddrelserna. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla te phuveskebrukfara- kabingpha an themmet saste progressionpha. Jick jibbeskesoralopha themmeskebrukfara aschar gla jick fedigt phuveskepha ta jeck jibbande themmeskekeribepha. Vorsnos baroaste uschalipha aschar te kerra gla jick fedigt, effektio ta trujalipha- malanot themmeskebrukfara palla Sveddingens ta EU:s themmeskebrukfara poletik. Kava aschar te vorsnos dokkar avti informationi ta pennande to themmets themmeskebrukfarare. Vorsnos ler friggande-iller baschi EU- hilprepha, kerrande gla dova iller, dikka to kerranden ta pottat avrifann EU:s hortepha- iller. ¶
Baschi Themmeskepottande- enheti - Länsstyrelsen Skåne ¶
Themmeskepottande-enheti aschar jeck themmeske bastanopha savo aschar nerrider manisch an savrige themm. Vorsnos aschar jeck baro duri masker manisch ta kommunerna an jeck riggen ta barothemmets- bastanopha. Riksdagen ta centrali bastanopha an dova vavver. Themmeskemoschen aschar chefi gla themmeskepottande-enheti ta kammar an uschalipha te kerra progressionpha ta dokka avri janepha to barothemmeske-bastanopha baschi themmets voltranden ta mustulanden.  ¶
Themmeskepottande-enhetins uschalipha aschar te menga gla jeck progressionpha doj trujali, baroande ta fediga jibbeskeastispha jaar vessta an vessta. Tikno pennat mengar vorsnos gla jeck fedig progressionpha an themmet. Themmeskepottande-enhetin uschalipha gla te pottande fann Manisch-representationi (riksdagen) ta barothemmeske-bastanopha pallakerras an themmet ta vorsnos kettaneskerrar dova themmeska kerranderna. Karna vorsnos racklar baschi themmets progressionpha saste vorsnos dynkra pre vorsnos saste menga gla dypas gla manischen ta manisch-kettanespha voltranden ta mustulanden. ¶
Themmeskemoschen aschar barothemmets-bastanopha flata avri an themmet ta avrijuras attjer barothemmets-bastanopha. Jeck baro kerrande gla themmeskemoschen aschar te kettaneskerra dova themmeska kerranderna an themmen, dikka to themmets progressionpha ta dokka avri janepha to barothemmeske-bastanopha baschi themmets voltranden ta mustulanden. An Kastonaforo-, Skånes och Västa Götalands themm aschar jeck themmeskeprealmosch ta an dova vavver themmen jick themmeskeenheti savo kerrar glad olle divuska menget ninna themmeskepottande-enheti ta savo tasa aschar themmeskemoschens nerridaste kettanesmengare ta jaar intus ta mengar baschi li ire lo tji nasht ire saste menga. ¶
An diarium registreri Themmeskepottande-enheti divuska nevo kerranden, kerranden savo kerras gla ta pottanden an kerranden. Kerranderegistri aschar offentliga ta publiceras pre internet ninna themmeskepottande-enhetins diarium. An kutti momenti nasht publicering attjer informationen garas ninna hilprepha attjer manisch-janepha-hortan. ¶
>> Jaa to themmeskepottande-enhetins diarier (Sveddingska racklepha) ¶
Themmeskepottande-enheti pottar butti ovaro pottande savo direkto ire andirekto gustrar themmets manisch ta roddrelser. Kutti pottande mustula bekkdokkas dovan savo aschar gustad attjer kavva friggan. Karna manischen attjer gustrade manisch aschar baro nasht annonseringen kerras an themmeskepressen, jeck sav pennas krajoracklande- annonsering, sav mosch tjii beschar avri pottanden ninna iller. ¶
Baschi diro fussar jeck vavver jibbiskesituationi attjer jick pottande savo themmeskepottande-enhetin kammar pottat baschi nasht diro buttast prealgolepha dolle. Ninna pottande fussar diro informationi savo pennar pre sar sutt diro nasht kerra. Themmeskepottande-enheti skickar senslo diro prealgolande to dova bastanopha savo saste potta diro frigga. Vorsnos nasht tasa kerra to ire baschidikka vorsnos solus pottande. ¶
Butti typeri attjer pottande savo kerras attjer jeck kommun, to exempli baschi keriebpha- lovrande, nasht prealgolas to themmeskepottande-enheti. Diro savo voltrar prealgola jick kommunalt pottande saste skicka diro iller to dova kommun savo kammar pottat. Diro mustula ascha an jeck pottande gla nashta kamma hortan te prealgola dolle. ¶
Glajanande-hortor aschar horter savo tjinnas savo glanskerandrande iller. Dova saste kerra siro tji to khoon pottande manisch avritan to sassmanischen. Themmeskepottade glanskerandrandeiller aschar ninna vavver pottande baschi pani-rakepha, naturi- rakesteddopha, panitradrande och sarvis puffrande. Themmeskepottande-enheti dokkar avri themmets glajanande-hortor savo aschar dypas prealrandrande- iller savo vorsnos kammar pottande baschi ta prealrandrande – iller savo kommunerna ire voddringskekeribepha kammar avrisuttat to sassmanischen. ¶
Svacko bascht avvar dolle an jeck baro tjinnepha remisser to Themmeskepottande- enheti. Dolle aschar te vorsnos fussa astispha te dokka vorsnos dynkrar fann ovaro departement, themmeska keribenpha ninna buttare. Themmeskepotto- enheti beschar tasa butti attjer siro dynkranden to pottanden pre remiss to gustrade intressenter an themmet. ¶
Themmeskepottande-enheti mengar kairopha ninna te tjivvra avri baro manisch-kettanespha informationi to manischen ta media. Webbeskeriggen ta vorsnos pressracklanden aschar jick sutt te dokka diro service anjurandepha an vorsnos meng. ¶
Kettanespha an EU prekerrar vorsnos savo manisch pre butti sutt, dypas an barot ta an tiknot. Gla themmeskepotto-enheti aschar dolle astispha te brukfara ketannes resursi, abbot asa le kisser to ketannes horter. Butti Themmeskepotto-enhetier kammar nationella kontakteri ta utbyten ire aschar an ovaroa kettanesmengprojekti preal nationhtemmar savo pre ovaroa sutt kerrar gla themmets progressionpha. Ketanesmenget an ovaroa formi kerrar tasa ninna themmar avriglan EU ¶
Themmeskepotto- enheti aschar jeck mengeskesteddo ninna buttiriggeske kerranden. Vorsnos aschar jeck janepha. Ta dikk to organisation ninna baro kompetensa an butti ovaroa tjack. Vorsnos divusliga meng aschar te dikka to te manisch- representationi ta barothemmets- bastanopha pottande pallakerras an themmet, ta te kettaneskerra ovaroa voltranden ta kerra glan manischens voltranden gla jick fedig menaisch-kettanespha – doj lovverpha progressionpha, trujali ta social- trujalipha tavas kettanes. ¶
Savrige Themmeskepotto-enheti aschar jeck solus upprisketjinnande bastanopha. Vorsnos kammar pottande pottanden gla huri vorsnos saste tjinna ire hyra tjack ta kerranden ta vorsnos kerrar hortan baschi offentliga upprisketjinnanden. Vorsnos brukfarar vorsnos tasa attjer astispha te kerra avrop pre dova themmeske ramiskepotto-illren. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla te themmets mollepha tjaralier, grassjor ta naturi-trujalipha saste kerras gla ta ascha sav savo dova kammat aschat. Dolle Aschar ninna vavvert te inventera arteri ta naturi-trujalipha, te fussa dokka hortepha gla kettanesmengare savo nasht kerra gla naturi-trujalipha te kerra gla jick butti fedigt naturi-raksteddopha. Naturi-raksteddopha ta nationaliskeparki aschar to sass manisch gla mukkebivalskejibb ta naturi-jurephaepha.  ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar uschalipha gla grassjo-rakepha an themmen. Vorsnos mengar glakerribande gla grassjoerna saste kamma dolle fedigt. Vorsnos nasht potta te le grassjo baschi dova kammat kerria ire kerra savo jeck manisch tji nasht kamma ninna grassjo te kerra, ire kamma jick typi attjer grassjo. ¶
An grassjo- rakepha- hortan aschar dolle pottande baschi te grassjo saste kerras fedigt gla ta rakepha masker duckalopha ta kerriapha. Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar grassjo-rakepha- kontrolli an themmet. Baschi jick grassjo kammat kerria nasht vorsnos potta te dolle saste bliddra led. Baschi diro pattjar te grassjoer kammar dolle kerria attjer manisch saste diro kontakti Themmeskepottande- enheti. ¶
Themmeskepottnade- enheti uschalipha gla te mattjanutritionen ta mukketjiro- mattjandet progressionpha ta bliddrar fedigare an regioni. Gla te kerrat sav savo dolle aschade selare ta kerra gla jibbeskesoralopha mattjarer hilprar Themmeskepottande- enheti ovaro mattjande-kesser- projekti. Vorsnos mengar tasa gla fediga mattja-astispha palla te kerra mattja- steddopha. Themmeskepottande- enheti saste dikka to te dova regleringar attjer mattjandet dynkrar to themmeske ta regionali voltranden ta mustulanden. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti uschalipha gla te kerra, kesserpha te kerrat fedigt gla naturi -ta kulturrakksteddopha, nationaliskeparki ta jaar-drommar an dova jivvenske- trujali. Dolle aschar butti kairopha te rakepha naturi. Nationaliskeparki aschar dova soraloaste rakepha- formeni. Dolle aschar jick baroare kettanesblavande steddopha attjer jeck themmesketypi savo rakepha an siro naturligeske aschande. Naturi-raksteddopha aschar dolle sassdivusliga rakepha-formi. Dolle nasht kerras gla te kerra biologiske buttipha, mollepha naturi-trujalipha ire gla te kerra gla dova steddopha gla mukkeskebivaljibbet. Kulturo-raksteddopha aschar jeck savrige rakepha-formi gla mollepha kulturo-themmar. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla te themmet saste kamma jick barvalo mukkeskebivaljibb ta te naturi saste ascha to sass manisch. Jeck bekk attjer dova naturi-steddopha vorsnos kerrar gla aschar kerrade savo dolle aschar lokkigt te tradra ninna julingskestammo ire nucko-voddring. An Sveddingen kammar sassaro jeck uniki astispha te siggra siro an naturi palla dova sav pennande sassmanisch-hortan doj dova baro hortan aschar ”tji gola – tji mullepha”. Sassmanisch- hortan aschar an naturi-raksteddopha, abbo nasht an kutti momenti ta steddopha ascha vavver. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla te themmets mollepha tjaralier ta grassjo saste kerras gla. Vorsnos mengar gla dokka glan rakepha-program gla rakepha traschanopha grassjo-ta tjarjaliarter. Baschi jeck arti aschar mukkeskerakepha fussar diro tji le dovan ire mullepha tjarjalien ire grassjon. Gla butti arteri aschar dolle tasa tji tjattjot te mullepha dovas jibbeskesteddopha. ¶
An Grassjo-puffrandepha-hortan pennas te sass grassjoer ta dovas aroar ta kere, aschar mukk. Dolle aschar te grassjoer rada fussa puffrepha baschi dolle steer randrat an grassjo-puffrandepha-hortans randrandepha. An Sveddingen kammar hisponagoare-manisch hortan te puffrepha pre dolle phuv sav aschar dovas nagopha. Abbo kutti siggrephamulade- grassjoer ire tji butt jurade grassjoer aschar tji an kava princip. Themmeskepottande- enheti dokkar avri janepha to puffrandepha-manisch ta manisch savo aschar phuvnagoare, registrerar grassjo puffrande- steddopha, dokkar avri licenceri ta ler informationi baschi puffrandepha-statestik. Vorsnos kammar tasa vescht baschi dolle savo aschar baschi rakepha-grassjo- puffrepha gla te kerra sav tji grassjo-dabbesker aschar. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar uschalipha gla administrationepha attjer dova baro darrano-gressjoerna an themmet. Golet aschar te Gressjoerna saste ascha an jibbeskesoralopha grupperi, savrigetjiro savo vorsnos voltrar tikno-kerra dova vinepha savo dolle nasht topha. To dova baro darrano-gressjoerna aschar bullo, ruv, lodgressjo, tiknoruv ta krajochirkalo. Themmeskepottande- enheti pallakerrar baschtliga inventeringar ta pottar baschi glanskekerrande hilprepha, rakepha-grassjo- puffrepha ta licensi-grassjo- puffrandepha ta dikkar akkter eventuella tjilegala puffrandepha. Vorsnos kerrar gla grassjo-dabbesker savo topha attjer darrano-gressjo. ¶
Themmeskepottande-enheti reglerar ta dikkar akkter phuvtradrande-semmno an terrengipha ta tradrande ninna jiveskevoddringar ire paniskevoddringar. Dynkrandet aschar te maskineri-tradrandepha tji saste gola ire mullepha phuven, tjarjalierna, mukkeskebivaljibbet, gressjojibbet, sarviskessern, phuveskebrukfarandet ire vessjeskebrukfarandet. Terrengitradrande pre kava phuv aschar tji tjattjot ta fussar tji kerras an helko Sveddingen. Jiveskevoddring fussa rada tradras pre jivvad themm. An kutti steddopha, jivvenskesteddopha, aschar voddringsketradrandet reglerad palla horter nerrider riggen attjer drommarna. Paniskevoddringarna fussa rada tradras ninna an kettanes- drommar ta an steddopha savo kammar dokkat horta attjer Themmeskepottande- enheti te dolle aschar an dovas hortepha. ¶
Trujalipha & klimati - Länsstyrelsen Skåne ¶
Themmeskepottnade- enheti kammar jeck baro kairopha uschalipha karna racklas baschi trujalipha- ta klimat- meng an themmet. Vorsnos kettaneskerrar trujalipha- meng, informeri ta dokkar avri janepha ta mengar ninna trujalipha- goli, trujalipha prealdikkande ta pani-kerrande. Vorsnos pottar baschi saro savo saste kamma horta to kettanesmengandemanisch savo voltrar hilpra ta kamma kesser gla trujalipha.  ¶
Manisch-representationi (Riksdagen) kammar pottat baschi jeck kettanespha trujalipha- politik gla te fedigt Sveddingen. Dolle baroaste golet aschar te dova akkter- generationerna savo avar sensloare saste fussa le preal jeck manisch- kettanespha doj dova baro trujalipa- vinepha aschar tji jeck vinepha buttare. Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar dova uschalipha te kettaneskerra dolle regionala menget gla te kerra dova sveddiska trujalipha- kvalitet golet. ¶
Sveddingens trujalipha- kvalitiskegoli: ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla glajura, glanskekerra ta le abri dova duckalo-risker an trujaliphan, dypas avri ta intohispo. Duckalo- rakepha saste glakerra te manisch tji bliddrar duckaloa. Vorsnos jurar ninna vavver pre golepha, darripha, bivalfulanopha ta tattoduipha. An Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar uschalin te aschar te kettaneskerra ta dikka pre kommunernas kerranden an duckalo- rakepha ta te dokka kommunerna janepha. Kommunerna duckalo- rakepha – pottopha nasht prealgolepha to Themmeskepottande- enheti. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kettaneskerrar dolle regionala menget ninna te kutta avri-tjivvarandet attjer tjarjalihispo- gaseri. Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar kettanes ninna themmets kommuner, bastanopha ta lovverskeneutronpha mengat glan jeck klimati – ta soralistrategio savo dikkar huri vorsnos saste nashta dokka to menga fedigt ninna klimati-golen ta dova vavver sorali. Vorsnos mengar ninna kerra gla manisch- kettanespha te kerra to jick klimati savo tji avar bliddra savriga savo an divus, vorsnos mustula dynkra pre te baropani bliddrar baroare ta pani-kerriapha bliddrar buttare an vorsnos themmar. ¶
Themmeskepottande-enheti kettaneskerrar trujalipha-prealdikkande an themmet. Te rodra ta konturnerligt dikka to huri dolle aschar an trujalipha aschar jeck baro bekk an vorsnos trujalipha- meng. Dova resultati brukfaras ninna vavver gla te dikka to menget ninna trujalipha- golen abbo tasa gla te rodepha nevo traschanopha. Prealdikkandet aschar langranodikkandepha akktersavo dolle mustula kerrat rodepha preal langro tjiroar gla te nashta jura baschi jeck vavver veschtanepha topha attjer manisch ire jeck nartulig variationi. ¶
Panipha mustula rakepha gla te vorsnos saste fussa jeck langrojurepha ta tjattjo paniskekammande. Sveddingen aschar andrebekkande an fimpus panithemm. Jeck themmeskepottande- enheti an savrige themm kammar bliddrat dova pani- bastanopha ninna uschalipha te kerra gla kvaliteto pre pani- trujalipha an jick themm. Dova manisch savo voltrar menga an kettaneskerrande meng ninna kava friggor mustula kamma avri hortan te menga, jeck potto-iller. Pre panikerrandet aschar soralo-keribepha ta regleringsdammar, ovaroa keribenpha an pani sav savo fallmaner ta tunnlar, muddringa ta paniavrile gla pieskepani- goli ta pani to tjaralier ta phuven. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar jeck Trujalipha dikkande delegation savo nasht dokka avri hortepha -pottoillet gla trujalipha- darrano kettaneskerrande sav savo trujalipha- balken pennar. ¶
Exempli pre trujalipha- darrano kettaneskerrande aschar ytikerrande - keribenpha, bar-keribepha, illerbrukfara- kere, bival- keribenpha, tatto - keribenpha ta vavver sorali- keribenpha, rombana- keribenpha, fulano- keribenpha, mutter- keribenpha, bar-ta barobar- keribenpha. ¶
An savrige kommun aschar jeck kommunal trujalipha - bastanopha savo kammar kesser gla dova lokali tojurepha attjer trujalipha- darranot kettaneskerrande. Vorsnos dokkar hilprepha ta pennande to dova kommunala trujalipha- bastanopha ta dynkrar pre ta dikkar to dovas kerranden. Vorsnos dikkar to Themmeskepottande- enhetens selare generationers nicklifulanden an phuv ta pani ta mengar ninna te kerrat dova fedigare. ¶
Themmeskepottande-enheti aschar jeck themmeske bastanopha savo aschar nerrider manisch an savrige themm. Vorsnos aschar jeck baro duri masker manisch ta kommunerna an jeck riggen ta barothemmets- bastanopha. Riksdagen ta centrali bastanopha an dova vavver. Themmeskemoschen aschar chefi gla themmeskepottande-enheti ta kammar an uschalipha te kerra progressionpha ta dokka avri janepha to barothemmeske-bastanopha baschi themmets voltranden ta mustulanden. ¶
Themmeskepottande-enhetins uschalipha aschar te menga gla jeck progressionpha doj trujali, baroande ta fediga jibbeskeastispha jaar vessta an vessta. Tikno pennat mengar vorsnos gla jeck fedig progressionpha an themmet. Themmeskepottande-enhetin uschalipha gla te pottande fann Manisch-representationi (riksdagen) ta barothemmeske-bastanopha pallakerras an themmet ta vorsnos kettaneskerrar dova themmeska kerranderna. Karna vorsnos racklar baschi themmets progressionpha saste vorsnos dynkra pre vorsnos saste menga gla dypas gla manischen ta manisch-kettanespha voltranden ta mustulanden. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar ninna manisch- kettanespha organisation saste kerra to te kerra fediga ta lattjo jibbeskeketannespha ta jeck langrojurandepha fedig jibbesketrujalipha gla themmets manisch ta trissar-manisch. Kulturo- trujalipha aschar jeck bekk attjer manisch- kettanespha parmissa, dolle dokkar kontinuitet an sassdivusjibbet ta buttar manischens pattjande ta janande gla siro baschithemm.  ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla te kerra kommunikationerna andrebachi themmet ta to vavver bekkar attjer baschithemmet ta te dova trujalipha bliddrar savo fedigt savo astis. Fediga kommunikationer ta jeck fedig IT- infrastruktur kerrar te buttare manisch, roddrelser ta kettanesmengare nasht baroa siro mengeskebikknepha. Themmeskepottande- enheti dikkar to ninna vavver te themmeskevoltranderna ire voltranderna savo aschar gla buttare kommuner kerras nerrider dynkrandet attjer infrastrukturiskeprojekti. Vorsnos administrerar tasa dolle themmeska organisationen gla barokerrandet attjer teli-riggen pre themmeskekeribepha. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kettaneskerrar dolle regionala menget gla jeck langrojurandepha fedig ta soralo soralitodokkande. Kettanes ninna themmets manisch kammar vorsnos let glan jeck klimati- ta soralistrategio savo sickrar huri vorsnos saste menga gla te kerra Sveddingens klimat- goli ta soralibaschisuttande. Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar ovaroa projekti gla te kerra jeck soralo buttare kerrande ta le glan phuveske gla te kerra kommunernas soralidynkrandepha. Dolle aschar ovaroa typer attjer bastanopha lovverpha gla soralieffektivisering ta prealjaande to glanskenevo- sorali savo Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar pottat baschi. Themmeskepottande- enheti trujalipha prealdikkande- deligationi pottar baschi dokka avri horta, potto-iller gla baro soralikeribepha savo bivalsorali- parki ta jivvesketatto- keribenpha. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar gla themmeska hilprande gla kerrande attjer phuranokere ta hilprandekere, gla radonsanering attjer tiknohispor ta pottar baschi sorali-lovveriller gla boddrandehispor ta kammorer. Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar dova informationi ta kerrar savrige bascht analyser attjer themmets boddrandebikknepha ninna vavvers savo hilprande to kommunernas meng ninna boddrandet. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti ler glan glanskedynkrandephuvepha gla ovaro savo pennar sar savo aschar baro-friggor ire dynkra pre nerrider to exempli kerranden ta phuveskebrukfara. Golet aschar te kerra fediga ta soralo jibb ta jeck langrojurandepha soralo jibbesketrujalipha. glanskedynkrandemenget prealkerras attjer ovaro nationella goli ta themmeskevoltranden, exempli karna dolle aschar soraliproduktioni, naturikesser, mukkeskebivaljibb ire kommunikationer. Vorsnos dikkar tasa preal dova kommunala kerrandet ninna dynker to manischens voltranden, themmeskevoltranden, trujalipha- kvalitetsnormer ta barophani- phuvens rekepha. Dynkrar diro kerriat baschi kommunens kerrandelovvrande ire detaljiplan nasht diro prealgola dolle gla vorsnos. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti nasht potta te kulturopramissiska mollepha hispopha, hispokeribepha- trujalipha, kangariske- trujalipha, parkeri ire vavver saste rakepha savo keribephabistrandepha. Themmeskepottande- enheti prealjurar ta pottar baschi jick objekt saste bliddra keribephabistrandepha, kerra tojurande attjer dova savo dokkar horta te kerra vavver keribephabistrandepha, kangari ta puvande- gårdar. ¶
Keribeskekesser aschar jeck bekk an Themmeskepottande- enhetens. Enheti langrojurandepha meng gla te kerra gla themmets ta kulturo- trujalipha. Gla te keribenpha saste kamma siro kulturiskeprammiska mollepha aschar dolle baro te kesser ta baschikerrande kerras avrifann dova solus hispoernas mustulanden. Dolle aschar tasa savo vorsnos saste brukfara kulturiskeprammiska tjattjo material ta metoder. Solus manisch, kommuner, fondi ta roddrelser nasht frigga Themmeskepottande- enheti baschi jick themmeske- lovver hilprepha gla te kessra kulturiskeprammiska mollepha keribenpha, jick sav pennat keribeskekesser- lovverhilper. ¶
Phuranodokkningar aschar semmno akkter phurano manischska kerranden, exempli boddrande, puvandephuv, ruiner ire kulturphuv fann maskertjiro foroer. Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar uschalipha te rakepha, kessra ta kerra gla vorsnos phuranodokkning- trujalipha, sav te dypas divusens ta tejsadivusens generationi nasht jana te furste dolle prammiska kulturiarvet. Dynkrat pre kulturiskebistrandehortan aschar dolle tji tjattjot te kerra vavver, mula, dabba ire gara preal jick phuranodokkningar, abbo Themmeskepottande- enheti nasht dikka horta to dolle baschi dova dynkrar dolle saste bliddra khoon fedigt attjer dolle. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti ta kommunerna nasht potta te mollepha kulturiskethemmar saste rakepha savo kulturo- rakesteddopha. Dojninna keribenpha, dokkningar ta phuv, ninna tasa dova mollepha savo aschar attjer kerranden, janepha ta traditioner. Jick kulturo- rakesteddopha nasht ascha sass fann jick karaktteriskehelko phuveskebrukfara- steddo to jeck kulturiskeprammissiskt industitrujalipha – steddopha savo pre ovaro sutt kammar kerrats attjer phuranoare phuveskebrukfarande ta uschallipha gla kesser atter dova kulturiskekesser savo aschar doj. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar ninna themmeskekisser gla te kerra ta jurephakerra themmeska mollepha. Baschi diro voltrar kissera jick mollepha kulturiskethemm savo pennar baschi themmets pramissa nasht diro fussa hilprande- lover fann Themmeskepottande- enheti gla dolle. Dolle nasht dypas ascha gla kulturiskedokkningar ta trujali- ta gressjojibb. Themmeskepottande- enheti dokkar tasa hilprande- iller to kettanesmeng, roddrelser ta solus manisch savo voltrar kerra lokali naturikisser- projekti (LONA). Baschi diro voltrar kamma lover to jick LONA- projekti saste diro golepha to diro kommun savo senslo dokkar an jeck frigga to Themmeskepottande- enheti. ¶
Manisch & manisch-kettanespha - Länsstyrelsen Skåne ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar kettanes ninna kommunerna gla te kerra fedigt an manisch- kettanespha ta gla themmets manisch – dypas privati- manisch ta roddrelser. Sassaro saste pre savriga voltrandepha bjuddras jeck jibbeske- trujalipha doj dolle aschar fedigt, lokkigt ta latjott te menga, boddra ta jibba.  ¶
Meng gla savriga hortepha ta astispha saste jaa palla Themmeskepottande- enheti kettanesmeng ta kettaneskerranden. Dova fulorackel- hortan aschar dolle tji tjattjot te diskriminera manisch avrifann baschi dova aschar moschar ire garior (dovas genderipha), dovas etnico- gruppi, dovas dynkrande pre devel ire vavver pattjande ire tjiipattjande (Hir), dovas bulopha- dynkranden, funktioni – vina, bascht, ta pre saro sutt dova sickrar siro genderipha. ¶
Dolle nationelli golen aschar te garior ta moschar saste kamma savriga sor te kerra manisch- kettanespha ta siro jibb. Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar to uschalipha te hilpra kommunerna, themmeska kerranden ta vavver regionali manisch an meng ninna te kerra siro kerranden savriga to sassaro an dynker pre dovas horta, kettanessuttipha. Themmeskepottande- enheti an Sveddingen mengar masker moschars dabb masker garier ta lubni- meng ta manischbikknepha gla sexuella- kerranden palla te kerra gla glakerrande projekti ta soralopha kettanespha masker bastanopha ta ideella kettanes- meng. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti an Kastonaforo- themm ta Sametinget aschar dova ninna baroaste uschalipha gla te kerra ta dikka to huri Sveddingens tiknomanisch-politik pallakerras an themmet. Tiknomanischpolitiken, friggor baschi rakepha ta hilprepha gla dova nationelli tiknomanischen ta dovas racklepha. Dova fimpus horta nationelli tiknomanischen an Sveddingen aschar Byskroar, Romano- manisch, Samer, Sveddinske- lollare ta Tornedalingar. Dova nationelli tiknomanischens racklepha aschar jiddisch, romani chib, samiska, finska ta meänkieli. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar uschalipha to kerra gla an manisch-kettanespha sav te helko manischen nasht fussa kansla siro fediga ta tji duckaloa. Manischduckalo-menget aschar baschi manisch solus voltranden abbo tasa baschi savodant savo avri trujalipha ta demokratiska hortepha an manisch- kettanesmenget. Vorsnos mengar buttast ninna steddopha savo gustrar kettanessuttipha, integrationi, trujalipha, boddrande- planering, sociala astispha, antidiskriminering ta pilo – ta kerriatjack – relateri friggor. ¶
Dova baroaste golet gla integrationspolitiken aschar savriga hortepha, uschalipha ta astispha gla sassaro tji dynkrat pre etniska ta kulturella tjack. Themmeskepottande- enheti saste kerra kettanesmeng masker ovaro kerrare ta kerra te dolle aschar fediga kapacitet an themmet gla nevoavade naschare ta vavver rakepha- manisch. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti aschar jeck regional simmali- bastanopha. Dolle aschar gla te vorsnos uschalipha te prealdynkra ta kerra simmali gla sass manisch, simmali to Europaparlamentet ta rackel-hilprande ta dokkande nationelli manisch golande to simmali ¶
Glanske simmalit pottar Themmeskepottande- enheti huri anbekkandet an simmalikretsi ta simali-themmarna saste jura avri ta le dova golepha attjer dova kandidater savo saste stee pre patiens simmali-iller. Nickli simmalirattin rappoterar dova ovaro simmalithemmen siro golresultati to Themmeskepottande- enheti. Dojakkter kerra vorsnos dolle brastiga kettanesjinnandet. ¶
Nickli jeck kris ire nerrider duriare glanskedynkrande saste Themmeskepottande- enheti hilpra ta kettaneskerra bastanopha, ta kerra gla baro manisch-kettanespha roddrelser an themmet. Vorsnos kammar tasa uschalipha gla te dokka avri janepha ta informeri baschi krisen kettaneskerras ta recklar sassmanischen ta medierna. Baschi jeck vinepha ire jick avritjivver kerras nerrider jick soralikeribepha kammar sass Themmeskepottande- enheti jick hilprande- ta rakepha uschalipha an siro themm ta Themmeskepottande- enheti an Uppsala, Kalmar ta Hallands themm kammar tasa baroare glanskedynkrande uschalipha. ¶
An butti tjack dokkar Themmeskepottande- enheti avri hortepha, pottande-iller ire dikkar to ta kerra kontroller gla te jura to te manisch kammat fedigt ta tji aschar duckaloa ire hortepha tji riggeskesuttas. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar to baschibuddi savo saste dikka to kangarier ta dikka to te dova savo tji aschar to dolle Sveddingska kangari tasa fussa phuvas pre jick sutt savo aschar fedigt gla dova. Vorsnos saste tasa dokka avri hortepha ta pottoiller to te tjivvra askan akkter jeck mulad manisch. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti nasht lottra diro deponera lovver pre jick kanno. Dolle aschar te vorsnos nasht le ta kamma lover savo diro saste projsa to kohnn. Dolle nasht to exempli kerras baschi diro savo lovverprojsande – boddrare kamma jeck goledabb ninna boddrarmoschen ire baschi diro aschar uschali lover avritan te jana to saro diro saste projsa dova. Diro uschali dynkras karni ascha projsad an tjiro baschi kutti rekvisit aschar kerrade savo aschar an hortan. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti nasht dokka avri hortepha, pottoiller gla sassmosch alidikkande- rakepha. Sassmoschande alidikkande- rakepha aschar te alidikkare dikkar pre jeck steddo doj sassmanisch nasht jaa to. Dolle aschar dy hortor savo regleri alidikkande- rakepha, hortan baschi sassmosch- alidikkande- rakepha ta manisch-janande-hortan, ta Themmeskepottande-enheti dikkar to savo te dova kerras. ¶
Primerproduktioni aschar jeckesta durit an kabingskespekkariernas- duri ta aschar produktioni attjer mass, tud, spannkabbing, grovalotfoder, kerrande attjer fodermultringar ta tradrande attjer dypas foder ta kabbinsketjack. Primärproduktion attjer kabbinsketjack kontrolleri attjer buttare duriar attjer Themmeskepottande- enheti ta Phuveskekeribepha. Vorsnos dikkade tasa to te kommunerna kammade fedig kontrolli preal te dova savo producerar ta bikknar kabing kammar sav butta janepha savo dova mustula kamma gla kerra ninna kammorerna ta buttare. ¶
Baschi diro kammar meng pre jick roddrelse savo jaar an konkurs aschar diro an attjer mengeskelovver- lovrande hortan. Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar uschalipha gla te projsa avri leschtatjirolovver to mengarna nerrider roddrelsen an themmet savo jaar an konkursi ire kerrar jeck roddrelsekonstruktioni. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti ler gol baschi sveddiska ninnaboddrande fann diro savo aschar ninnaboddrare an Daniken, Lollothemm, Norge ire Island. Jeck gol aschar jick lokkigt sutt te kerra baschi ninnaboddrande. Baschi diro aschar ninnaboddrare an jick vavver themm jeck kava saste diro jaa diro to migrationiskekeribepha. Baschi diro attjer khoon tjack bliddrar attjer ninna diro ninnaboddrande nasht diro dokka dolle palla jeck gol to Themmeskepottande- enheti. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar sav pennade notarius publicus. Lavet aschar latin ta aschar nasht mosch penna . Notarius publicus saste ninna vavvert hilpra sassmanischen ninna te potta laveskerandrande, dovas voltranden, prealrandrande ta vavver kerranden an potto- iller, ascha doj savo jick manisch savo kammar jurat karna sigili suttas pre ire kerras vavver ta dikka preal lotteri. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar borgerliga jengeskekerrande-manisch ta kammar jeck iller preal saro manisch savo aschar kerrade to jengeskekerrande-manisch an savrige themm. Baschi diro aschar nickli 18 bascht ire baschi diro voltrar jaa intus an jengandepha ninna khoon savo aschar dolle mustula diro kamma horta fann Themmeskepottande- enheti gla te fussa bliddra jengandepha. ¶
Manisch savo kamma dolle kerriat ninna kerra siro lovverpha baschi savo dova kammar duckalopha, phurano ire khoon vavvert nasht fussa hilprepha attjer jeck fedig- mosch ire jeck glanskemosch. An savrige kommun saste dolle ascha jeck prelbastano- mosch ire prelbastano- namndi savo dikkar to te kommunernas fediga- mosch ta glanskemosch kerrar siro meng. Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar dikkar gla prealbastano-moschen ninna ovara tjiroar ire dikkar jeck prelbastano- mosch akkter to exempli jeck gol fann sassmanischen. ¶
Baschi Webbeskerigget - Länsstyrelsen Skåne ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti webbeskerigg saste hilpra diro savo avvar intus doj ta dikkar ta kammar informationi baschi sar Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar ta huri dolle prekerrepha diro ta manisch- kettanespha baschi diro. Webbeskeriggen aschar glanledda an kettanesmeng ninna vavver Themmeskepottade - enheti attjer Sveddingen.  ¶
Pre jeckestapattrinet aschar dolle doj diro nasht jura jeck toppiskemeny doj dolle buttaste informationen baschi vorsnos kerrandepha aschar. Pre jeckestapattrinen aschar ankuv to pottande- iller, lovver-iller ta hilprepha, iller ta publikationer ta aktuello friggor ta nevopha. ¶
Rodepha-lav an laveske tav – savodant savo vorsnos janar te butti voltrar jura pre webbeskerigg. Baschi diro rodepha akkter ”Golepha” gustrar diro pre lavepha G. ¶
An pattrinsjerot aschar jeck rodepha- ruto doj diro nasht randra an simmalimukk lav, rodepha kerras pre helko webbeskerigget. Dolle dokkat pre sassaro typeri attjer lav. ¶
Jurar dova hierarkiska strukturi. ¶
Pre sassaro pattriner pre kava webbeskerigg aschar jeck funktioni gla te dokka avri informationi pre pattrinen an sociala medier. Funktioni suttar nickli an pattrinens rubrika to righti baschi Radra avri. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti kerrar savo langro dolle aschar astis dova durihortor savo aschar offentligeskepha pre webben. Vorsnos kammar brukfarat Vervas horter: drommeskedurin 24- timmarwebb savo jaar ninna WAIs durihorta WCAG 1.0. Kava sav langrot dolle aschar astis an dolle plattiskeformi vorsnos kerrar webben an. ¶
Webbeskeriggen kammar nani solus tjattjokerra- funktioni pallasavo tjattjopallkerranderna kammar jeck astispha te kerra vinepha gla brukfararens solus sutt. Dolle aschar lokkigt te tjattjokerra webbeskebleddrarens solus sutt savo te diro to exempli nasht fussa baroare kontrasti ire baroare rander. ¶
Vornos webbeskerigg kerrrar siro lattjot an niitjiroska webbeskebleddrare, savo kerrar siro fedigt ninna webbeskestandarder suttade attjer W3C. Dolle aschar to exempli nevoare versioner attjer Firefox, Safari, Internet Explorer, Opera ta Google Chrome. ¶
Jeck cookie aschar jeck tikno randerfili savo webbeskerigget garar pre diro dator. Cookies brukfaras gla te dokka jeck trissande manisch astispha to ovaroa tekniska funktioner. Dolle aschar dy typeri attjer cookies: ¶
Voltrar diro tji dokka cookies nasht diro lokkigt klisa dolle an diro webbeskebleddrare. Abbo kavva nasht kerra savo te kutti webbeskeriggen tjii nasht dikkas pre savo dova saste. Diro nasht simalli te klisa dypas typeri attjer cookies. ¶
Iller pre webbeskeriggen aschar garade an Portable Document Format (PDF) ta gla te bleddra kavva mustula diro kamma Adobe Acrobat Reader, savo diro mukkepha nasht le kere fann Adobe. ¶
Funktioni ninna manischjanande- hortan, tasa pennad PUL aschar te rakepha manisch masker te dovas manischliga integritet avrilajjas palla kerrande attjer manischjanandepha. Themmeskepottande- enheti webbeskerigg dynkrar ta kerrar siro kerranden avrifann pottanderna an PUL. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti fussar astispha to diro manischjanande karna diro golepha diro to jeck trissepha ire vavver savrige, beschar diro akkter jeck publikation ire beschar e- iller to bastanopha. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti aschar jeck themmande bastanopha. Kava aschar te iller savo beschas to vorsnos bliddrar sassmanischiga, savo nasht avva te dokkas avri palla offentlighetsprincipen. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti webbeskerigg kammat randerpha, kartor, maklinskeiller ta illustrationer savo aschar nagohorta- rakepha ta fussar tjii brukfaras avritan dokkat- horta- Savrige aschar dolle ninna vorsnos logotyp. Doj dolle tjii pennas sari informationi aschar fann aschar Themmeskepottande- enheti nago- mosch. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti stimulerar themmets mengeske- roddrelser ta kettanesmengare pre ovaroa kairopha gla te kerra jick fedig lovverpha progressionpha ta butta mengen. Themmeskepottande- enheti voltrar kerra to lovverskejibbet te menga ninna friggor sav savo kettanessuttipha, trujalipha ta integrationi gla te soralopha jeck fedig baroande.  ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti stimuleri themmets lovverskejibb pre butti sutt gla te kerra jeck lovverpha fedig progressionpha ta kerra gla mengeske- astispha. Vorsnos kettaneskerrar ninna kommunerna, lovverskejibbet ta vavver kettanesmeng gla te kerra gla dova nationelli golen gla themmeske golen. Palla ovaro lovverske- ta hilprepha ta kerrar Themmeskepottande- enheti to te kerra fediga roddrelse klimati, jeck fedig infrastruktur an formi attjer drommar, kommunikationer, bleddrande ta forskning ta astispha to lover. Vorsnos pennar to te lovverskejibbet te menga ninna friggor savo gustrar kettanessuttipha, trujalipha ta integration gla te soralopha jeck fedig progressionpha ta baroande. ¶
Svacko bascht fussa Themmeskepottande- enheti lovver attjer regeringen savo saste brukfaras to ovaro manisch- roddrelser hilprepha. Hilprepha saste hilpra themmens roddrelser te fussa jeck langrojurandepha baroande. Hilprepha typi varierar masker ovaro themm ta preal tjiro, dynkrande pre saro resursi ta uschalipha regeringen kammar dokkat to themmen. Vorsnos nasht dokka lover to ovaro tjack investeringar, bekknephakkerranden, innoveationsprogressionpha ta bleddrande an tikno ire maskerbaroa roddrelser. Dolle aschar jick hilprepha to kommersiell service pre themmeskekeribepha, exempli themmeskespekkariar ta maklingsketioner. ¶
Konkurransi stimuleri to jeck fedigare brukfarande attjer manisch-kettanespha resursi ta kerrar dolle astispha gla nevo manisch- roddrelser te avva intus an bekknepha. Themmeskepottande-enheti saste an nerrider kettaneskerrande ninna dova konkurrenskerrare kerrar jeck effektiv konkurransi ta privata ta offentliga mengepha. Vorsnos saste informeri baschi konkurrensfriggor ta kerra dolle jurandepha patrinepha pre te konkurrenspottepha tji kerras. Kontakta vorsnos baschi diro opattjanoar te kutti budeskedokkare kammar pottat siro baschi te sutta konkurransi avritan. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti nasht dokka diro lovverpha to jick projekti savo kerrar gla dova regionali progressionpha ta baroandet. Diro nasht rodepha projekti- hilprepha baschi diro kettanes ninna vavver manisch kammar jeck dynkerpha savo ernos voltrar pellakerra an jick projekti. Projektet saste ascha khoon nevo, ascha avriglan dolle ordinarie ketanesmenget ta ascha butti dynkrandepha ta tjiro. Resultatet attjer projekti saste ascha to kerrat fedigare gla butti manisch. ¶
Themmeskepottande-enheti kammar jick uschalipha te menga masker lovversketovva ta finansiering to terrorism palla te dikka to fysiska ta juridiska manisch. Lovversketovva aschar karna lover savo avar fann stillopha kerrande ti lovver savo nasht redovisas legalt ta uppri. Terrorismfinansiering aschar te lovverpha hilpra terrorism palla lovver ire palla te le dova lover savo saste hilpra finansiera terrorism. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti aschar tojurande-bastanopha gla dova fondier savo aschar an themmet ta vorsnos kammar uschalipha gla te registreri dova. Jeck fondier aschar jeck solus kerrnade barvalopha savo aschar to jick potto goli. Jeck pottande-enheti ire jeck glakammare kammar uschalipha te kerra gla dova lover. Themmeskepottande- enheti kammar jick databas doj diro nasht jura saro fondier savo aschar an Sveddingen, dovas goli, trissephamanisch ninna buttare tjack savo aschar fedigt to jana. ¶
>> Jaa ta dikka pre dova databasen ninna fondier (Sveddingens racklepha) ¶
Jick prealjurande-roddrelse jurar to hispopha, kere, kammorapha ninna buttare, offentliga chelepha ire jeck solus manisch. Sass prealjurande- roddrelser mustula kamma hortepha, potto-iller, sav pennad auktorisation, attjer Themmeskepottande- enheti. Ninna kava mustula auktoriseringen saste vorsnos penna te sass manisch savo aschar gara-manisch ta dova savo tji aschar gara-manisch horta te menga ta dokka roddrelsen horta to kamma gara-juckar. ¶
Themmeskepottande- enheti mengar gla jibbeskesoralopha mattja ta jeck langrojurepha ta fedig mattjan-neutriation. Dolle aschar Themmeskepottande- enheti savo dokkar hortan to te etablerad mattja, lollomattja – ta musselneutrion. Vorsnos nasht tasa dokka hortan to lovver-hilprepha to licensierade mengeskemattjare sav te dova nasht kerra siro mattjantjack ta dokka lover gla dova muli savo pani- gressjo kammat topha pre dovas tjack ta kerrande. Themmeskepottande- enheti dokkar avri EU-hilprepha to investeringar an mengeskepha mattjande. Panibrukfara, beredningsindustrin, bleddrandet, progressionpha- projekti ninna buttare. Vorsnos nasht dokka pennanden ta lovver- hilprepha to dova savo voltrar kerra gla ta etableri dova turistimattjande-industrio. ¶
Dova savo kammar jick voddringsketjivver- roddrelse mustula dokka hortan attjer Themmeskepottande- enheti an dolle themm doj menget saste kerras. Vorsnos dikkar to ta kontrolleri te dova steddoer jibbar uppri to kommunernas trujalipha- pottanden ta dolle savo voltrar kamma hortan ta dolle keribelovvranden savo mustula ascha. Kerria voddringar saste tasa dokkas to jick leeskesteddo, jeck steddo savo producenterna avrisuttat- leeskesteddorna saste golas to Themmeskepottande- enheti attjer voddringskeproducenterna. ¶
Jeck simalo- loverkere aschar jick roddrelse savo lindrar avri lover to diro masker te diro dokkar intus khoon savo simalo. Dolle aschar Themmeskepottande- enheti savo dokkar avri dova hortan to simalo- loverkeren ta kammar tojurepha preal dova. Dolle savo voltrar kamma jeck simalo-loverkere mustula kamma fussat hora attjer Themmeskepottande- enheti an dolle themm doj menget aschar. Jeck simalo- loverkere nasht solus mengas ninna hilper attjer jick sveddiska aktiebolag ire jick savrige avrithemmskt roddrelse an EES-steddopha. ¶
Gla te fussa kerra jeck chelepha ninna voddringar pre drommen mustula mosch kamma horta fann Themmeskepottande- enheti an dolle themm doj chelepha aggrar. Gla te kerra atletic-, chelepha ta vavver an dabbeske-atleticpha mustula jick horta dokkas avri fann Themmeskepottande- enheti an Örebro themm. Baschi jeck bingo- kelimano ire lotteri saste kerras an butti kommuner intus jick themm aschar dolle Themmeskepottande- enheti savo dokkat hortan te kerras. Baschi lotteriet kerras attjer jeck kettanesmeng savo aschar kerrande an jeck kommun aschar dolle kommunen savo dokkar avri hortan to kerrat. ¶
PSA honkar jick rattskiri savo honkar andre dova rodepha savo diro nasht fyssa kerra karni prostatan rodepha. ¶
Diro nasht dokka jick PSA-rodepha baschi diro kammar mutterdromskerriapha savo darton dynkrar adhinela pre prostatan, baschi diro butt mustula jaa ta buttra akno savo muttret honkar sasta. ¶
Diro nasht aur fyssa dokka jick PSA-skiri baschi darton prinja hari averkerela attjer prostatan karni dova bliddra rodderpha, averkerela savo nasht soskip butt najek pharipe ta duckalopha. ¶
Dolle honkar barot te jana te jick baroande attjer PSA-jinnepha tji honkar savriga savo prostatacancer. Dolle honkar buttvar ta lokkigt baroanden attjer PSA kammar vaver soskip. ¶
Pre savriga sutt nasht jick jinneskepha tji dynkra pre prostatacancer. Resultatet mostula sarstil les avrifann savi kerriapha diro kammar ta so vaver rodepha jurar. ¶
Baschi diro kammar dy ire buttare nerrider moschanoa narthan ninna prostatacancer, honkar astispha te diro kammar dukkalopha baroare. An sav perr nachta diro le PSA-rodepha buttare fann dolle diro honkar 40-50 basht glan to 70 basht phuro. ¶
PSA rodepha aur teli kerrande hilprande attjer prostatacancer. Baschi hilprepha hilprar juras kava dolle palli te PSA-jinnepha bliddrar tiknoare. ¶
PSA-skiri kerras tji nika svacko sastekontroll gla moschar gla te jura bàsi dova kammar jick sela form attjer prostatacancer. Dolle adhinela pre te dolle tji sarstil honkar jeck ulave ninna te jura ta hilpra dova sela formerna attjer prostatacancer. Hilprepha nasht dokka biverkningar savo impotens ta inkontinens gla moschar doj prostatacancern narstill saste kamma progressionpha to nàntis seriozib duckalopha ¶
Cancer an prostatan nasht anten bajrol duroment biso te dokka hari pharipe ire bajrol siggrepha ta spreddra siro to vavera kotar an truppon. An jikk sela ovibe jar dolle tji te jura savi cancerform diro kammar ta vorsnos nasht hilpra jeck cancerform diro tji saste kamma fussat hari nàsjalo attjer telal diros jibetjiro. ¶
Buttar moschar mangela kerra rodderpha gla kamma janepha bàsi dova kammar prostatacancer. Anglal diro pottar diro gla diro saste dokka jikk skiri gla PSA honkar dolle sukar te le janepha buttare bàsi glaulavela ta menulavela ninna jeck hilprepha attjer jeck sela jurande cancer. Mangela diro senslo ja ta rackla ninna jeck doktora saste diro budra jeck tjiro pre jeck duckalokere ire pre fakkasastepa. ¶
PSA honkar jick tiknaribe gla prostataspecifikt anten. Dolle honkar jick protein savo kera an prostatakörteln ta savo tradrar ninna sädesvätskan karni moschen fyssar anjaribe ta kera sav te spermierna bliddrar roddligare. ¶
PSA aschar thaj an rattet, ta dolle honkar dova savo juras pre palli PSA-skiri. Buttare jeck cancer aschar dolle butt butvar averkerela an prostatan savo nasht kerra te PSA-halten an rattet bliddrar baroare. Kisko prostatabaroande ta inflammation an prostatakörteln, sav pennad prostatit, rodde to te dolle muttras avri buttare PSA an rattet fann prostatan. ¶
Ninna bashten baroar PSA- halten tikno gla dova buttaste moscharna dojgla te prostatakörteln bliddrar tiknoare baroare ninna baroande phuro. ¶
Dova baroaste PSA an rattet honkar tavat to najek proteiner. Abbo dolle aschar thaj tikno mukkanot, otavat PSA. Karni dolle beschar vaver soskip panda canser àkkter jeck tikno PSA-baroande, ismarela dolle ascha buttare mukkanot PSA an rattet. dojgla nasht dolle dokka darton jeck hilprande te jura dova tavande ta mukkanoa PSA: ¶
Skiri ismarela les an muslingen ninna hilpra attjer jeck suj savo penles an jikk ratttjarò, jeck ven. Dojgla pennas kava rattskiri gla venöst skiri ¶
Skiri nasht les karna savo pre divusen. Diro saste sutta teli an 15 minuti angla skiri les. Nanit mostula kerras selare. ¶
Baschi diro kerrar jick kirurgiskt kerrande an prostatan baroas PSA-jinnepha. Diro fyssa biddra tiknoast 10 divusar andrean dolle honkar astispha te le jick PSA-rodepha. Baschi duckalo-moschen dojkoro rada kanslar pre prostatan prekerras tji PSA- jinnepha. ¶
Skirit beschas to jick duckalokerelaboratorium doj dolle analyseras. Diro nasht potta ketannes ninna duckalo-moschen baschi karna ta huri diro saste fyssa jana resultaten attjer rodepha. Duckalomoschen brukfarar fyssa svardara fann laboratoriet andran jeck to dy divusar. ¶
Jick skirisvardara mostula sarstil voggras ketannes ninna savi kerriapha savo diro kammar ta savi vaver rodepha sikkras. ¶
PSA-jinn an rattet varincija prele najek moschar, thaj prele moschar savo tji kammar prostatapharibe. Gla te darton nachta kamma kommoni te Jekharela ninna keda skirisvardera nachta dràbbras ismarela sav kàra referensjinn. Gla PSA ismerelar jinn schettanil 3 mikrogram pre liter jinnas savo jeck vasdibe. ¶
Jeck attjer desch maskerphurano moschar kammar barot PSA-jinnepha. Jeck topa to lokki baroande nasht ascha fedig prostatabaroande. ¶
Baroande jinnepha nasht diro fyssa baschi diro kammar jeck prostatainflammation´, sav pennad kronisk prostatit. ¶
Jeck mutterdromminfektion nasht dokka jeck abriande, abbo baroande attjer PSA. Baschi diro attjer khoon topha tji nasht muttra ta budra karon, nasht diro fyssa baroande PSA-jinnepha. Kammar diro dolle keria te budra karon sav te mutter svacko tjiro aschar an brukfaras dolle pennas urinstämma. ¶
Baroande jinnepha nasht tasa topa pre prostatacancer. Attjer dova savo kammar baroande PSA juras canser gla jeck attjer trinn. Kettanespha masker bukkanot ta tavat PSA nasht dokka duckalo-moschen tikno hilprepha karna dolle honkar te jura baschi baschi dolle honkar prostatacancer. ¶
Attjer dova savo rodepha siro butt tjiros teli butt basht, avar jeck attjer pansh kamma jick PSA-jinnepha savo motiverar buttare rodepha. ¶
Baschi jick resultat attjer jick PSA-rodepha sickrar pre jick baro jinnepha, brukfarar duckalo-moschen kerra buttare jeck rodepha ninna ultraschunn ta vävnadsrodepha fann prostatakörteln. Baschi duckalo-moschen jurar cancer jaar dolle te fyssa hilprande ninna operation ire hormonhilprande. ¶
Tikno jinnepha pennar koro te diro kammar prostatacancer, abbo rada jick PSA-rodepha tji tjattjo penna kava ninna hortepha. ¶
Baschi diro fyssar prostatan abribeschade palla jeck operation tiknoas PSA-jinnepha to jeck tikno nivå. Jeck tikno PSA-jinnepha nasht brukfaras palli jura baschi operationen kammade jick fedig effekt. Tasa nerrider strålning ta hormonbehandling brukfaras jick tiknoande PSA-jinnepha ascha jick partin pre te hilprephan aschade fedig. ¶
Arakgarantia aschar te diro saste fussa arak andre jeck potto sikk tjiro. Dolle honkar jeck kanunimo kotar saste attjer sastepà ta dukaloarakkanuni. Arakgarantia pennar andre savi tjiro diro nachta erbjuddras pre arak fann themmjakoro ire regionin. Dojkoro potto arakgarantia tji bàsi arak nachta dokkas ire savi arak diro nachta fussa. ¶
Arakgarantia pennar sar hàrga diro savo hargas nachta hòftara pre te fussa arak. Dolle aschar najek tjiropotto gla najek arak, savo 7 divus gla te fussa trissa jeck darton pre jeck arakcentrali ire 90 divusar gla te kera jick gostibe, fussa jeck arak dikhljaribe andre dova specialiserade araken. Bàsi kava tji jar te kamma arak andre kava tjiro pre kava akrakikheren diro kammar rodela, erbjuddras diro jeck gostibe ire siro arak pre jeck vaver akrakikheren. Diro nast aur bliddra bistrade to jeck vaver akrakikheren an jikk vavoret themmjakoro. Dolle honkar sarstill sarstil mukkanot te pakre ehe ire nane to jikk erbjuddrande bàsi arak pre jeck vaver akrakikheren panda doj diro kammar rodepha rodelat. ¶
Sigutno arak astarela tji attjer arakgarantia. Bàsi diro bliddrar sigutno duckalo ire anaven saste diro fussa arak sav siggo savo diro nast. ¶
Fann arakgarantia kammar diro horta to: ¶
Arakgarantia chani tji ¶
Dolle aschar jeck nationell webbpatrin gla odorederibe attjer arakgarantia ta biddratjiro. Pre webbpatrinen sikkras biddratjiror andre sàssaro themmjakoro ta regioner. ¶
Bàsi diro erbjuddras jick gostibe ire jeck dikhljaribe savo tji nast dokkas andre arakgarantias pottandetjiro, nacha diro erbjuddras arak gla pre jeck vaver akrakikheren. kava nast asha pre jeck arakcentrali, jikk duckalokere ire pre vaver steddo privatikano lajarin. Diro nast solus penna anglat diro farnissar bàsi diro mangela ava, abbo bàsi arakgarantia nacha asha nast diro tji valjfara muckat. Bàsi diro tji mangela fussa arak pre jeck vaver steddo jeck panda doj diro kammar rodelar nast diro penna mukhela naneto fann erbjuddrandet bàsi arakgarantia. Dolle nast nisaninela te diro fussar biddra làngstroa. Bàsi diro sensloare tji voltrar nast diro sàrstil le kontakti ninna diros akrakikheren. Arakgarantia aggrar dannro chani fann kava datum. ¶
Themmen subventionerar, dolle mangela kati lover savo hilpra, karna diro mustula hoftfara drabb ta jeck kotar vaver kova diro mostula basi diro kamma dukkepha. Dova buttaste drabb savo randras avri pre recept honkar subventionerade. Subventionen prammisas basi an kanuni baschi drabb.hilprepha. Kava arakhibe koro baro mollepha savo kanuni dokkar karade an divusligt rakkra gla baromollepha rakkephat. ¶
Attjer kanuni pottas dolle te: ¶
Dandeskearak- ta drabbkeret, TLV, honkar dova beddo savo pottar basi mollepha ta subventioner. Karna TLV nachta le agorlejbe bàsi subventioner jurar dova pre basi drabbet dokkar jeck hilprande savo aschar savrige koro molleph a te subventionera dolle. Kava nast ascha fedigare satsepha ta langroare jibb. TLV jurar aur basi ismarelar nast tiknoa manischkettanespha mollepha, gla operationer, dukkalorandande ire phuranoarak. ¶
Drabbreskerodrelserna nast solus valjfara te bekkna te drabb avri baromollepha arakhibe. Dannro honkar mollepha muck, dolle aschar te drabbreskerodrelserna pottar mollepha solus. Gla drabb savo tji aschar an baromollepha arakhibe fussar diro solus projsa saroe mollepha. ¶
Jeck kotar drabb nast kamma jeck tikno subvention. Kava aschar te drabbet honkar subventionerat rada gla jeck patientgruppi ire gla te hilpra sikk dukkepha. ¶
TLV ta FASS kammar webpatrin doj diro nast jura basi jick drabb honkar subventionerat ire tji. ¶
Dolle nast asja buttir attjar savriga drabb. Dova pennkarade generiska drabb. Dova kammar savrige butt kerrande emni ire emni ta kammar savriga kerrande. Abbo dova nast jura najek avri ta kammar najek kova, dolle assja konseveringsphani. Dova nast ava fann najek drabbreskeroddrelser ta kamma najeka mollepha. Kava valjefarande nast paripha avri koro varveran pre drabboforma. Dolle honkar drabbkheret savo pottar savi drabb savo fussar paripha avri koro jikk vaver. ¶
Basi dolle asja butt generiska drabb ta dova savo steddrar pre recept tji honkar dolle emrepaste mostula drabboforma paripha to dova valjefarande savo kammar tjinnepha tiknoaste mollepha. Kava honkar rada dolle emrepaste valjefarande savo honkar helko subventionerat. Diro nast valjfara te tjinna dolle kuschare drabbet savo steddrar pre recept, abbo dannro mostula diro prejsa prelejaveripe solus, dova honkar tji an baromollepha arakhibe. Basi diro tji voltrar kamma dova valjefarande savo drabboforma paripha to ta tji dova savo steddrar pre recept nast diro valjfara jikk vaver generiskt valjefarande. Abbo dannro fussar diro prejsa helko mollepha solus. Dolle honkar rada dova savo steddrar pre recept ta dolle kopraste paripha drabbet (savo astarela attjer subventionen). Soskipe to kava honkar te nane saste prejsa buttare jeck teroa gla jikk drabb basi dolle asjar buttare attjer savrige to najeka mollepha. ¶
Basi diro attjer drabbreske soskipha mustula ismaerla jikk drabb attjer jick fabrikerat nast darton penna pre receptet te drabbet tji fussar paripha koro jikk vaver. Dannro mostula diro tji prejsa dova mollepha basi te drabbet honkar gla baromollepha arakhibe. Drabbeske soskipha nasht asha te diro honkar allergiskt koro jick rankiemne an jick drabb ire te diro kammar kerria te uppri jeck drabbeskelleddikan. ¶
TLV pottar savi mollepha savo saste ismarela akkter jikk drabbeskeroddrelse friggat basi jick mollepha-vaver. Mollepha pre jikk drabb nast, bliddra vaver svacko tscho. ¶
Karna dolle aschar generiska drabb pennas dova veljefarande savo fussat tiknoaste mollepha gla pariodi kova. TLV dokkar avri janepha to drabboforma basi savi veljefarande savo honkar periodi kova ta savo dova saste paripha to. TLV pottar aur basi dy vaverfaljefarande te paripha to basi periodi kova bliddrar phater. Dolle nasht asha najek fann tscho to tscho savi valjefarande savo drabboforma paripha to. ¶
Soskipha ninna periodi kova honkar te dova deisibebukja savo honkar gla subvention attjer drabb saste doschta to sav butt ta sav buttar savo seipe. ¶
Periodi kova honkar savrige pre sassaro drabbforma. Abbo nasht ascha te jikk drabboforma kammar tjinnat jeck sass to baro attjer periodi kova. Drabboforma fussar dannro bekkna dova teli avande montran. Kava aschar te diro nasht bliddra bjuddrar glanske montrans kova pre jick drabboforma ta kava tscho kova pre jick vaver. Kava dy kova nast kammma najek mollepha. ¶
Baromollepha arakhibe aschar te diro prejsa baroast 2 200 lock telal jeck periodi pre jick basht. Kava basjt pennas jeck baromollepha periodi. ¶
Baromollepha arakhibe aschar gla drabb savo diro fussar pre recept savo TLV kammar pottat saste ascha subventionerade. Kava aschar aur gla ismarelakova savo diro fussar pre jick sav pennat hilpreskekova-kartli. ¶
Karna dolle aschar dova buttaste drabb prejsar diro jeck sav pennad jeck tjiro mollepha svacko tjiro diro ler avri pre recept to diro avar uppri to 2 200 lock. Savrige ninna ismarelakova savo mostulas niga stomi. ¶
Gla hari drabb prejsar diro nane jeck tjiro mollepha. Basi diro kammar insulindikhljaribad diabetes prejsar diro nane gla insulinet. Basi diro kammar jeck dukkepha savo honkar telal dukkalodokkande-kanuni prejsar themmeskepottarna saroe mollepha gla drabb savo tiknoar dolibe virusmulande drabb koro hiv. ¶
Khonra themmeskepottare prejsar saroe mollepha ire jeck kotar attjer solustaksa gla khonra drabb ta khonra patientgruppi, savo nast assha p-drabb to terno garier. ¶
Diro prejsar nane gla ismarelakova savo mostulas gla te dokka truppon dabb ta gla te potta preal diro drabb. Kava nast assja sujar ta vaver ismarelakova. ¶
Karna diro agra jeck baromollepha-periodi pre jick basjt prejsar diro saroe mollepha gla drabbet ta stomikova solus to diro kamma prejsat 1 100 lock. Senslo tiknorelar jeck tjiro solustaksan bekk gla bekk attjer dova sav pennande baromollepha-kati. Niga svacko nevo tjinnande agrear diro fann dova mollepha diro kammade niga glanske tjinnat ta avar odore opre an kati. ¶
Karna diro kammar prejsat 2 200 lock mostula diro tji prejsa buttare telal baromollepha-periodi. Jeck mostula gla kava honkar te dova. Gla te dole nast chani honkar te lender drabb diro saste le avri. Andrekammas attjer baromollepha arakhelet. Karna baromollepha-periodi honkar phater agrar diro ninna jeck nevo periodi (niga aver tjinn saste diro panda honkar pre baromollepha-kati). ¶
Kettanesdynkrande drabbeskemollande ¶
Diro prejsat sav hemuso ¶
Sikkrar sar baromollepha tabellen arakhibe dokkar jeck jaeske tiknoad mollepha. ¶
Kabingkovar to nuckoar teli 16 basht ta kammar khonra dukkepha, savo glutenintolerans, honkar subventionerade. Kabingkovar randras avri pre jeck sav karade kabingkova ill ta diro fussar annera avri baroast 90 divusar svacko volta. Diro projsar jeck solustaksan pre 120 lock svacko volta, abbo dolle taksajinnas tji ninna an baromollepha arakhibe. ¶
Diro nast tji tjinna sar butt savo avel andre baromollepha arakhibe. Dova buttiphe diro fussar tjinna nasta to an doschta to 90 divusar, kava mangela penna trinn tschona. Preventiondrabb, savo p- drabb ta p-sujar, honkar tji ninna kava tjattjomaskero. ¶
Basi diro fussar le avri pre recept buttare tjiroar nast jick nevo kerras glanske karna dolle jaddet dy tinntekotar attjer dova tjiro savo drabbet dynkras saste doschtas. Basi diro kammar let avri drabb gla trinn tschonra glaismerela dolle kamma jadde dy tschon anglal diro fussar avri pre recept vidder. ¶
Diro nast tjinna avri jeck baroare butiphe panda avripha pre tjiro, abbo dannro mostula diro prejsar saroe mollepha gla dova butiphe savo honkar buttare jeck gla trinn tschon glaismarela. Basi darton kammar randrat pre receptet te dolle mostula ja jeck tjiro masker sav diro tji nast le buttare jeck darton kammar pennat. ¶
Basi diro kammar soskip, basi diro saste ascha avrithemm jeck langroare rjiro, nasht diro le avri drabbet andre baromollepha arakhibe gla jeck langroare tjiro jeck trinn tschorna. Abbo dannro mostula diro nast sikkra dolle. ¶
Gla te baromollepha arakhibe saste chani mostula dova savo randrar avri drabbet kamma siros mengeskesteddo randard ninna jeck kodi pre recept. Basi receptet aschar jikk drabb ninna pottad subvention mostula randraren aur randrat pre receptet te baromollepha arakhibe nacta chani. ¶
Baromollepha arakhibe aschar gla dova savo honkar boddrad ire mengar an Svedijo ire dova savo kammar jikk europeiskt dukkalosiguripe-kartli fann jikk vaver EES-themm ire Schweiz. Dolle europeiska dukkalosiguripe-kartlit nast sikkras appri solduj niga dartonarak ta bra drabboforma. Svedijo kammar aur simmali ninna khonra themmar avri Europa; Algeriet, Australien ta Quebec an Kanada, savi aschar te dolle aschar gla ninneskeboddrare fann kava themmar bàsi dova fussar jikk zori attjer drabb karna dova aschar an Svedijo. ¶
Sassaro nuckoar teli 18 basjt an savrige kere, dolle honkar dova randrade an savrige boddra adresa, kammar jikk kettanes baromollepha-arakhibe. Dolle aschar te sassaro nuckoars solustaksa jinnas kettanes. Dolle aschar te biologiska phralar ta penja savo honkar randrade pre najek steddo kammar siro baromollepha arakhibe. ¶
Diro mostula tji solus jana sar butt diro kammar tjinnat gla. An dova sav karade baromollepha databasen, sav kerras attjer dova themmeske bolaget Drabboforma dinster AB (Apotekens Service AB), randras sassaro tjinnanden andre baromollepha arakhibe. Systemet janar pre sar butt diro kammar prejsat an solustaksa ta jinnar vri sar but rabatt dolle bliddrar attjer baromollepha-kati svacko volta diro tjinnar. Sassaro drabboforma honkar saviga an savriga databaser sav diro nast tjinna pre savit drabboforma savo diro mangela ¶
Dolle hunkar mukkanot te tava siro to baromollepha databasen. Dolle savo randras andre an databasen honkar nav, manisch-jinn, andretjinnande, pre savi drabboforum diro ledde receptet fann, sar butt diro prejsat, dova mollepha diro kammar fussat an baromollepha arakhibe ta aggreskedatum gla baromollepha-periodi. Janepha savo randras teli ismarela gla te diro saste kamma horta to rabatt. Nane janepha basi savi drabb diro fussar ire savi darton savo randrat vri recept registrinela. ¶
Diro nast dannro diro nast kamma jikk avri attjer baromollepha arakhibe savi janepha savo aschar basi diro, ta basi dova nuckoar savo diro honkar narthan gla. Dolle kerrar diro preal te randra jeck lill to drabbforum dinster AB, doj kammar diro illerna. ¶
Diro nasht valjfara te tji asha tavad to baromollepha-databasen. Dannro fussar diro jikk kvitto savo karas baromollepha-sikkrar pre drabboforum karna diro tjinnar drabb andre baromollepha arakhibe. Pre kava steddrar savi kettanesdynkrad solus mollepha diro kammar prejsat. Dolle honkar barot te rakka dolle sensloaste baromollepha-sikkrandet ta te sikkra uppri dolle kettanes ninna recept karna diro saste tjinna drabb. Drabboforma mostula jana pre savi nivo an baromolepha-kati diro aschar pre gla te fussa horta to rabatt. ¶
Nuckoar savo honkar sudardo nast fussa dukk an thulosanimortik an schynlon suvlo. Dova nast aur fussa dukk attjer jeck tharibe an preleschynlon, schynlotharibe. Solduj sudraripe ta schynlotharibe honkar buttast infekcijadukkepa ke nuckoar. Buttvar jangno nuckoarna pre rattia attjer dukken ashtersavo dova honkar dukkare karna dova honkar sutar. Dolle nast prinjas lokkir te domra ninna hari blovina telal scherot. ¶
Vaver pharipe savo nast dokka schynlo dukk honkar tharibe an schònnasdrommen sav savo ròdrar kettanes andre ninna koro dubbasanimortik, jeck momtapa ire pharipe ninna khòren. ¶
Jeck schynlotharibe an preleschynlon aggrar buttvar siggrepa avri bàsi diro aschar nasht tecknot. Nuckoarna nast fussa kerrit ninna te shonna. Dolle honkar buttast ninna jag. Nuckoar nast aur fussa schynlotharibe avri biso dukk. ¶
Bàsi diro haja te nuckon kammar schynlotharibe nast diro dokka dukkfassande drabb savo andrekammar paracetamol, savo Alvedon ta Panodil, ire drabb savo andrekammar ibuprofen, savo Ipren ta Ibumetin. Drabb aschar an thavdela form, savo stolpiller ta savo drabb. Dolle aschar rander sarkeribe pre leddikan. ¶
Karna kava aschar nuckoar savo honkar telal sinkus tschon saste diro tji dokka dukkfassande drabb biso te angleske frigga jeck darton ire dukkalopenja. ¶
Nuckoar telal18 basjt savo kammar jag nachta tji ismarela dukkfassande ta jagtelisutt drabb ninna acetylsalicylsyra, savo Magnecyl, Treo ire Albyl minor, bàsi tji jeck darton kammar rekomandirihela kava. ¶
Nakdrabb nast tiknorela nakphater ta kera dolle lokkigare gla nuckon to le andre bival. Te nakdrabb saste hilpra koro schynlotharibe kammar tji nasat sikkrat. ¶
Bàsi dolle kammar ovelat jekk kev an dubbsanimortik saste diro biddra ninna te nanda to dolle phatrat thavdela frann schònnasdrommen. Karna dubbsanimortik kammar bliddrat sastarela, sav saste keras siggrepa, nast diro nanda. Kammar diro kev an schunlorna ire jeck schynlotharibe nast diro tji nanda ninna schero telel panit. ¶
Nuckoar nast fussa schynlo dukk jeck an tikno kettandoro ninna sudardo. Abbo bàsi dukken tji jar schettani, nachta nuckon roderpa pre akracentrali ire dartonarak andre dy-trin divusar. ¶
Bàsi nuckon honkar matto, tji nashtar kheliber ta tji pi ire honkar telal sinkus tschon nast diro kontakti araken. ¶
Diro saste sàrstil kontakti akracentrali bàsi dolle thavdela panipe vri fann schònnasdrommen pre jikk nucko oginda bàsi nuckon kammar dukk ire tji. ¶
Diro nast sarstill tava dukkaloaraken gla te hamma godi. ¶
Preal te nikalo mukhela jikk gynekologiskt hurdiniskiri nasht diro arakhiber seri koro uterumencancer. Hurdiniskirit les fann uterustappen an telaldummon ta nasht sela sikka bàsi diro kammar hurdin averkerela savo saste nashta ava to uterumencancer. ¶
Dova buttaste hurdiniaverkerela savo juras honkar lokkiga averkerela savo bliddrar fediga attjer siro solus, abbo jeck kotar hòftara les abri. An butt nasht hurdiniskiri sikkra te diro kammar canser. Keda ismarela cancern asha an jikk sela stadium ta dikhljaribe nasht bliddra lokkir ta ninna tiknoare palodukk. ¶
Garior an Svedijo avar nikalo to gynekologisk hurdiniskiri, sav pennad screening. Bàsi diro honkar prele 23 ta 50 basjt avar kàrande saste trinte basjt. Akkter butvar pansva basjt to diro honkar 60 basjt phuro. Bàsi diro honkar schettani 50 basjt nasht rutinerna assja najek adhinar saste diro boddrar an themmet. ¶
Diro nasht thaj mukhela hurdiniskiri bàsi diro honkar ke trakksa ire gynekolog gla te kerra jeck gynekologisk rodepa attjer vaver soskip. ¶
Diro hòftara tji kerra kommoni anglal, abbo dolle honkar fedigt bàsi diro tji kammar bulepha ire ismarel vauta an telaldummon divusen rescha rodepa. Vaverast nasht skiri bliddra kerria te dicka. Diro saste tji dokka skiri karna diro kammar kintan. ¶
Karna rodepa nachta les fussar diro le avri diro isar pre telaltruppon ta pacha diron an jeck gynekologisk rodepa stammo. Darton ire trakksa nasht le skirit pre najek sutt. Buttvar ismarela jeck tikno spatel savo les koro uterustappen ta senslo jeck tikno kovlo kosting an uterusmenvoltan telista kotar. ¶
Buttvar fussar diro aur svardara pre hari frekkra an kettanes ninna skirit. Svardaran honkar barot gla te skirit nachta analyseras pre hortepa sutt. ¶
Rodepha kerrar tji dukk ta ler rada hari minuter te kerra. Svardara pre hurdiniskirit ismarela diro fussar andre sinkus phagela. ¶
Skirir honkar tji darano. Diro nasht rattra tikno akkter abbo dolle honkar daranot. ¶
Jikk gynekologiskt hurdiniskiri honkar jikk skiri savo les fann dova teligaste kotar attjer uterusdarmenen savo pennas uterustappen ta savo avar to an lishtin. Skirit nasht sela sikkra bàsi diro kammar hurdini averkerela savo nasht ovela cancer. Dova buttaste hurdini averkerela savo juras honkar lokkigare averkerela savo ovelar fediga attjer siro solus, abbo dolle nasht hòftara les abri. Skirit nasht aur sikkra pre cancer, abbo dolle honkar tji sav butt. ¶
Bàsi diro nikalo dokkar hurdiniskiri fussar diro jikk soralot arakhibe koro uterusmenscancer preal te hurdini averkerela nasht lattjas anglal dolle kammar bliddrat to cancer. ¶
Hurdiniskiri les fann dova teligaste attjer uterusmenen, pre uterustappen savo avar to lishtin. Livmoder = Uterus Äggstock = Arokarsht Livmoderhals = Uterusmenen Livmodertapp = Uterustappen Slida = Lichti ¶
Jikk gynekologiskt hurdiniskiri aschar an dova sastepha kontroller, sav pennade screening, savo garier an Svedijo bjuddra nikalo to. Preal te hurdini averkerela keda nasht juras ta kerras sela, kammar dolle kerat to te uterusmenscancer kammar bliddrat obuttast teli dova senslot 40 basjten. ¶
Jikk gynekologiskt hurdiniskiri nast aur mukhela bàsi diro honkar ke trakksa ire gynekolog ta jar sigate jeck gynekologisk rodepa attjer vaver soskipar. Hurdiniskiri nast asha jeck kotar attjer jeck gynekologisk rodepa bàsi diro kammar rattera abbo kava nast aur asha jikk fedigt moment te dokka jikk screeningskiri. Dolle nast asha fedigt bàsi dolle honkar tjiro te dokka skiri, ire bàsi diro kammar bistrat jeck selare hurdiniskiri kontroll. ¶
Hurdini averkerela, nast adhine pre jeck irritation an slemhinnan soskipat attjer bakterier ire jeck virusinfektion. Dolle honkar dova buttaste typen attjer hurdini averkerela savo nasht kerras attjer siro solus. Vaver hurdini averkerela savo saste nast rodra to uterusmencancer, nast les abri ninna jikk tiknoare kerrande. ¶
Bàsi diro kammar jeck hurdiniskiri savo tji honkar savo dolle nachta asha, kerras jeck skiri ta buttvar bliddrar diro kara to jeck dartonrodepa. Abbo nast dannro fusa rodit te hudini averkerela nast les abri ire te diro nast biddra ta jura bàsi averkerela bliddrar fediga attjer siro solus. ¶
Dolle ismarela le duri tjiro anglal hurdini averkerela bliddrar uterusmencancer, buttast 10 to 15 basjt. Dolle honkar buti obuttas ta cancer juras niga hurdinaskiri, abbo dolle sajda nantis volta. Dannro ismarela cancern asha jikk sela stadium ta araken bliddrar lokkigare ninna tiknoare palodukk. ¶
Svacko basjt fussar tiknoare panda 450 sveddinska garior uterusmen cancer akno buttare, 30 000 garier, fussar agorlejbe (beslut) bàsi te dova kammar hurdini averkerela. ¶
Sàssaro garior predde 23 ta 50 basjt fussar jeck karande to ava to hurdiniskiri svacko trinte basjt. Senslo fussar diro jeck karande svacko pansva basjt karna diro honkar predde 50 ta 60 basjt. Bàsi diro honkar schettani 50 basjt nast tjiro predde karande asha najek pre saste diro boddrar an themmen. Garior savo selare bliddrat arakade gla hurdini averkerela nast hòftara hurdiniskisi kontroller aur akkter 60 basjt. ¶
Karand bischas te dova steddo doj diro honkar randrad ta dolle honkar sarstil mukkanot te ava. ¶
Karna diro kammar fussat jeck karande les hurdiniskiri attjer jeck trakksa pre nerridaste trakksakhere, savo thaj kara dakriaarakcentral. An dolle buttaste fusar diro jeck pottad tjiro abbo diro nast kamma jeck nevo tjiro pre nantis vavra thann. ¶
Bàsi diro mukhela hurdiniskiri an kettandoro jeck ninna gynekologisk roderpa, to gynekolog ire an kettendoro ninna preventivdrabb, ismarela skiri aur registrinelas sav te diro fussar aver bjuddrande bàsi hurdiniskiri kontroll akkter te dolle kammar jadd trin ire pansva basjt. ¶
Bàsi diro honkar telal 23 basjt bliddrar diro tji schettani to te ava pre hurdiniskiri kontroller. Hurdiniaverkerela honkar an ta gla siro butt glanske 23 basjt, abbo dova buttaste bliddrar fediga attjer siro solo ke sav ternoa garier. Dolle honkar obuttast te uterusmencancer aver sav sela. Basi diro kammat besjat an jeck gynekologisk hurdiniskiri kontroll ta kammar butt fediga hurdiniskiri karna diro ovelat 60 basjt saste diro tji kamma uterusmencancer. ¶
Bàsi diro tji kamma, kammat bulade mukhela diro tji dokka hurdiniskiri. Uterusmen cancer aver rada ke garier savo kammar kammat bulade ta savo dannro fusat jeck typ attjer HPV, humant papillomvirus. ¶
Bàsi diro honkar homosexuell sav honkar dolle fedigt te ja pre nikalo hurdiniskiri kontroller ashtersavo viruset savo nast soskip hurdini averkerelar kammar dolibe thaj fann garier to garier. ¶
Bàsi diro kammar fussar saroe uterus abriopererad, savi karas total hysterektomi hoftara diro tji ja pre hurdiniskiri kontroller, ashtersavo uterustappen dannro aur honkar saroa bortri niga operationen. Abbo bàsi operationen kerrades pre phuv attjer uterusmencancer ire hurdini averkerela an uterusmen nachta diro ja pre kontroller. Dannro les jikk skiri fann leshti schettani kotar. ¶
Bàsi diro honkar opotto pre savi operation diro kammar kerrat ire so savo lets abri nast diro frigga pre dova klinik doj operationen kerrades. Trakksan pre steddot nast buttvar aur hilpre to te fusa glann dova janepha. Honkar diro opotto, honkar dolle fedigare te le jikk skiri. ¶
Diro nachta tji kerra kommoni anglal hurdiniskiri pre kommoni sutt, abbo diro saste tji kamma bulade ire te ismarela makhin ire vauta an leshti divusen anglal rodepat. Hurdiniskiri nast vavros bliddra kerria te jura. Abbo diro saste tji dokka skiri karna diro kammar kintan. ¶
Glan roddepat hoftara diro le avri diro isar pre telaltruppon ta pacha diron an jeck gynekologisk rodepa stammo. Skiridokkaren savo honkar jeck trakksa ire jeck darton, kotar arahimo pre leshtivanten ninna gynekologiska instrument savo nachta asha truppotattoa. ¶
Sar skirit les aschar najek fann steddo to steddo. Butvar honkar dolle jeck spatel attjer ruck ire plast les koro uterustrappen ta senslo ismarela jeck tikno kovlo kosting an uterusmenvoltan telista kotar. ¶
Hurdiniskiri jar siggo ta lela butvar nantis minuti. Dolle ismarela tji kera dukk. Jeck kotar nast prinjar pharipe, dolle jar schettani siggo. ¶
Diro fussa svardara pre frekkrar an kettandoro ninna hurdiniskirit ¶
Svaderan bishades ninna skiri ta hilprar laboratoriet te kera siro shinavibe. ¶
Uterusmens slemhinna rattar lokki ta dolle honkar buttast te diro fussar jick tikno ta odarano rattepa akkter rodepa. Rattepa phater akkter nantis divus. ¶
Skirit honkar saroa odarano ta dolle jar fedigt te kerra skirit bàsi diro honkar phari. Dolle ismarela rekomandirihela te diro mukhela skirit an 15 phari phagela aschtersavo jeck rodepa attjer jikk skiri nast ascha kerriar bàsi pharit kammar jadde gla langstro. ¶
Andre sinkus phagela saste diro fussa jikk akonum ninna skirisvardara, abbo kava nast le langstro tjiro. 95 attjer 100 skiri honkar biso hurdini averkerela ta vakerelas savo buttast. Svardarat fussar diro keda tede bistrade to kheren fann laboratoriet. ¶
Bàsi skirit dokkas niga jeck gynekologsteddo ire vaver lejarin honkar doj buttvar dolle savo kammat skirin savo bichar svardara. ¶
An obuttast peribe kammar skirit tji nast analyseras, bàsi doj aschar butt ninna kintanratt an skirit. Keda bliddrar diro pennad karade to jeck nevo hurdiniskiri. ¶
Bàsi skirit sikkra hurdini averkerela attjer kommoni dabb juras dova odora. Bàsi diro kammar lokkiga hurdini averkerela ta kammar bliddrat 30 ire 35 basjt, basjtdanniken honkar adhinela attjar sako diro boddrar an themmet, sav rodepa skirit siggrepa ninna jick virusskiri. Skirit kontrollerar bàsi diro kammar jeck typ attjer HPV, humant papillomvirus, savo nast dokka uterusmencancer. Rada dova savo akno kammar dolle HPV – typ hoftare dannro ava to rodepa. Bàsi diro kammar lokkiga hurdini averkerela savo tji kammar savot virus hoftare diro rada le jikk nevo skiri jikk basjt sensloare. ¶
Karna dolle aschar sassaro hurdini averkerela ke garier savo honkar teli 30 ire 35 basjt rekomandirihela nii te dova bliddrar rodepa attjer jeck gynekolog, abbo kava sasstro aur te dova pre themmar bliddrar karade to jeck nevo hurdiniskiri gla trakksa. Garior savo honka schettanir 30 ire 35 basjt ta savo kammar vaver hurdini averkerela panda dova lokkigaste, rekomandirihela aur te bliddra rodepa attjer gynekolog. ¶
Nikalo hurdiniskiri dokkar jikk soralo arakhibe koro uterusmenscancer, abbo kava honkar tji pherda. Diro nast fussa uterusmencancer thaj te hurdiniskiri kamma besjat fedit, abbo kava honkar butti obuttiast. Thaj diro jar pre hurdiniskikontrola nikalo nachta diro sarstil kamma arak bàsi diro fussar rattra niga bulapa, bàsi diro kammar rattrapa predde kintan, ire bàsi diro fussar rattrapa akkter te diro kammar phater kammt kintan. ¶
Diro nast sarstill tava dukkaloarakrodidokkarna gla hilpra bàsi saste diro nachta jar. ¶
Te dokka hurdiniskiri nast prinjas kerria. Diro nast prinja seri nervolo telal tjio savo diro biddra pre skirisvardara. Keda nast kava asha fedigt te dynkra pre te hurdiniskiri honkar jikk sutt te arakhiber seri koro cancer. Dova averkerela savo juras nast sarstill les abri ninna jikk lokkigt keribe sav diro slipprar fussa cancer an glansketjiro. ¶
Kava honkar obuttast te jikk skirit sikkrar te diro kammar fussat cancer. Lender vara cancer juras preal hurdiniskiri kontroll ismarela dova tjill an jikk sav sela stadium te arak bliddrar lokkigare ta ninna tiknoare palodukk. Preal hurdiniskiri kammar dukkalopha nastat juras ta riziko te bliddra seriozib dukkalo tiknoare. ¶
Skirit savo diro mukhela niga hurdiniskiri ismarela kedelas. Jikk nevo skiri nast jekharela ninna purano skiri ta najek kettanesansari nast keras. Skiri nast aur ismarela to forskning ire vavoret savo kiskoprinjas attjer jeck forskningsetisk kommittè. Bàsi dir tji mangela te skirit nast kedelas gla glaneske´tjiron nast diro pucka to dova savo kera skirit, ta kava maggras senslo. ¶
Janepha bàsi skirit kedelas aur an kvalitetsregistret savo ismarela gla te kerra jeck fedigare arak. Bàsi diro tji mangela te diros janepha saste nachta ismarela gla dole nast diro rodela te lender les abri. ¶
Savo pasienti andre sastepha- ta dukkaloaraken kammar diro hortepha te bliddra adsiker ninna respekt ta fussa janephabashi sastepha ta basi dova roderpha ta dikhljaribe savo sastro. Diro sasstro fussa jeck fedig arak. ¶
Sasstro diro dynkrar araken honkar nasjlo savo diro kammar ire diro dynkrar basi adsikeret. Kava nasht ascha tecknoa vina to baro savo kammar soskiphe baro anavenan ire mulopha. Diro nast tjalla savo saste kerra menget te bliddra hortare. ¶
Doj asja butt najek steddo te iranela seri to ninna rovibe. Kava nasht ascha tjibbigt te fussa jikk randrat svadera karna diro rovib gla te an stila drabbra drabbra svardarat savo dolle tji ovela kommoni vina. ¶
Dolle honkar fedigt te anglal ja to dova darton ire jeck vaver arakseniphe savo kammar kerrat ròderpá ta dikhljaribe. Buttvar nast vina nices vri pre doj sut tiknorela tatispha te kava kerras vidder. Diro nast aur sarstill ja to pottaren nerrider jeck enhet doj diro fussat araken, steddopottaren pre jeck lajarin. ¶
Karna dolle aschar kommunal sastepha- ta dukkaloarak savo kheraarak iranela drabb dochalo diro to dova dukkalopenja, kara MAS, an kommunen. ¶
So savo aschar themmeskepottankerat ta kommunal arak honkar najek an najeka kotar an themmet. Diro nast frigga siro kommun irethemmeskepottarekeren bashi konn savo kammar doschalo gla araken. Buttvar dochalo kommunen gla lokkiarekheraarken akno themmeskepottan kerrar dova baroare dukkaloaraken an keret. ¶
Jeck steddo savo diro nast dokka pennanden to honkar patient laijaren savi nasht pennas gla . Saste kerra gla baro patient pottopha an dukkaloaraken. ¶
Laijaren saste ascha an sass themmeskepottare gla te le koro rovibe pre saradsikere diagnos, drabb, taksa, gravbefekkra ta arakgarantia an laijaren politiker akno dolle honkar dinreskemusch savo kerrar gla rovibe. Laijaren rovibe politiker ta dinreskemanusch kammar stildajatava. ¶
Patient laijaren honkar jick mokkano fann sastepha- ta dukkaloaraken ta dolle mollar nane te ava doj ninna friggor ire rovibe. ¶
